mapper.insert: insert into job_insight( member_id, base_job_title, analysis_json, related_jobs_json ) values( #{memberId}, #{baseJobTitle}, CAST(#{analysisJson} AS JSONB), CAST(#{relatedJobsJson} AS JSONB) )
mapper.select: select insight_id, member_id, base_job_title, analysis_json, related_jobs_json, created_at from job_insight where member_id = #{memberId} order by created_at desc limit 1
